channel.title: adventure on Poonam Chauhan
channel.description: Recent content in adventure on Poonam Chauhan

item.title: Women's day 2020 : Lalbagh botanical garden
item.description: Bangalore has this very old and famous botanical garden called Lalbag. The other night my flatmate suggested that we go somewhere and have some fun rather than having the same old lazy weekends. The imprompt decision was to go to Lalbag. There are many activities carried out in here by various groups. It’s a scenic view to see people from all age groups indulged in variety of activities. We happened to visit Lalbag for bird watching which is conducted by a group named bngbirds led by Mr.

item.title: Adlabs Imagica: A bitter sweet experience
item.description: Adlabs Imagica is a serenic place in outskirts of Mumbai with lots of activities to do. One can go for a weekend getaway and enjoy the destination’s offerings i.e. Theme park, Water park, Snow park, etc.It does give the thrill and a sense of adventure to its visitors.Various attrations at the theme park include the rides namely Nitro, Scream Machine, Dare 2 Drop, etc. I had been to Imagica’s theme park last weekend with friends and siblings.
